I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall p : prec_list, pl_produit_path_incl_def_2 p prec_empty

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_produit_path_incl_def_2 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> (exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 (prec_cons a pl0 prec_empty) /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1) \/ pl_path_incl plp l : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_compatible_empt_r : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible p prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
pl_compatible_empt_l : forall p : prec_list, pl_compatible prec_empty p -> p = prec_empty
pl_product_0_2 : forall p : prec_list, pl_produit_1_incr prec_empty p
pl_produit_path_incl_1_1 : forall p : prec_list, pl_produit_path_incl_def_1 p prec_empty
pl_product_0_0 : forall p : prec_list, pl_produit_0_incr p prec_empty
pl_produit_path_incl_1_0 : forall p : prec_list, pl_produit_path_incl_def_0 p prec_empty
pl_tl_length_prod_2 : forall p : prec_list, pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 prec_empty p
pl_tl_length_prod_0 : forall p : prec_list, pl_tl_length_prod_def_0 p prec_empty
pl_tl_length_prod_1 : forall p : prec_list, pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 p prec_empty
pl_produit_path_incl_1_2 : forall p : prec_list, pl_produit_path_incl_def_1 prec_empty p
pl_product_0_1 : forall p : prec_list, pl_produit_1_incr p prec_empty
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
indprinciple_pl : forall P0 P1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P0 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 prec_empty p) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 p ls -> P1 p la -> P0 p (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 la p -> P1 ls p -> P1 (prec_cons a la ls) p) -> forall p p' : prec_list, P0 p p' /\ P1 p p'
prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p
indprinciple_1 : forall P0 P1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P0 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 prec_empty p) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 p ls -> P1 p la -> P0 p (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 la p -> P1 ls p -> P1 (prec_cons a la ls) p) -> forall p p' : prec_list, pl_prof p <= 0 -> pl_prof p' <= 0 -> P0 p p' /\ P1 p p'
indprinciple_0 : forall P0 P1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P0 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 prec_empty p) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 p ls -> P1 p la -> P0 p (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 la p -> P1 ls p -> P1 (prec_cons a la ls) p) -> forall n : nat, (forall p p' : prec_list, pl_prof p <= n -> pl_prof p' <= n -> P0 p p' /\ P1 p p') -> forall p p' : prec_list, pl_prof p <= S n -> pl_prof p' <= S n -> P0 p p' /\ P1 p p'
prec_in_state_M0_false : forall p : prec_list, ~ prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p
pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl
pl_tl_length_prod_5 : forall p p' : prec_list, pl_tl_length_prod_def_0 p p' /\ pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 p p'
pl_produit_path_incl_1_5 : forall p p' : prec_list, pl_produit_path_incl_def_0 p p' /\ pl_produit_path_incl_def_1 p p'
indprinciple_2 : forall P0 P1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P0 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 p prec_empty) -> (forall p : prec_list, P1 prec_empty p) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 p ls -> P1 p la -> P0 p (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls p : prec_list), P0 la p -> P1 ls p -> P1 (prec_cons a la ls) p) -> forall (n : nat) (p p' : prec_list), pl_prof p <= n -> pl_prof p' <= n -> P0 p p' /\ P1 p p'
borne_0_0 : forall p : prec_list, prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M0 prec_list)
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
invar_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
pl_sum : forall pl : prec_list, pl = prec_empty \/ (exists (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl = prec_cons a la ls)
sem_listes_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d p (tcons hd tl) -> p <> prec_empty
invar_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, rec_list_terms d p t n = true
st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
pl_card_0 : forall pl : prec_list, 1 <= pl_card pl
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
pl_ess_invar_0 : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, 1 <= pl_essence pl0 pl1
pl_path_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Prop, P pl_path_nil -> (forall (a : ad) (p : pl_path), P p -> P (pl_path_cons a p)) -> forall p : pl_path, P p
pl_compatible_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compatible pl0 pl1 -> pl_compatible pl1 pl0
pl_compatible_compat : forall p0 p1 : prec_list, pl_compatible p0 p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1

``` 
intros p.
unfold pl_produit_path_incl_def_2.
intros n m plp a l H1 H2 H3 H4.
left.
exists plp, (pl_path_product plp pl_path_nil).
split.
- reflexivity.
- split.
  + apply pl_produit_path_incl_1_1.
  + apply pl_produit_path_incl_1_0.
```
